sect1.title: Default routes
sect1.para:
Zend_Controller_RewriteRouter is preconfigured with two default routes. The first handles your root URL and is mapped to indexAction of IndexController: so you have to provide them as outlined in the
(see ). The second default route is included to provide compatibility with the first version of the router. It will match URIs in the shape of 'controller/action'.
sect1.note: Though Zend_Controller_RewriteRouter is configured for backwards compatibility it will not match controller/action URIs with additional parameters just yet.
